import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "../services/api"; import "./Dashboard.css"; export default function Dashboard() { const [feedbacks, setFeedbacks] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("/feedbacks").then((res) => setFeedbacks(res.data)); }, []); const avgRating = feedbacks.length > 0 ? (feedbacks.reduce((a, b) => a + b.rating, 0) / feedbacks.length).toFixed(1) : 0; return (
{/* Stats Section */}

Total Courses

{feedbacks.length}

Average Rating

{avgRating}

Total Feedback

{feedbacks.length}

{/* Table */}
Course Feedback Dashboard
{feedbacks.length === 0 && ( )} {feedbacks.map((fb) => ( ))}
Course ID Course Name Duration Comments Rating Actions
No feedback found. Add new feedback.
{fb.courseId} {fb.courseName} {fb.courseDuration} {fb.comments} {fb.rating}
); }
